sqlMap.select: select MAX(creationDate) as lastLogin, DelegateAudit.countryId as countryId, (SELECT Name from Country WHERE ID = DelegateAudit.countryId) as country from DelegateAudit where actionId = 0 group by countryId

SELECT delegateaudit.countryId as countryId, country.name as countryName, min(delegateaudit.actionId) as minAction, max(delegateaudit.actionId) as maxAction FROM delegateaudit, country WHERE delegateaudit.objectId = #id# AND delegateaudit.countryId = country.id AND (delegateaudit.actionId = 1 OR delegateaudit.actionId = 3) GROUP BY delegateaudit.countryId, country.name

select observation.id as observationId, observation.creationDate as creationDate, country.id as countryId, country.name as countryName, min(delegateaudit.actionId) as minAction, max(delegateaudit.actionId) as maxAction from paragraph, observation, delegateaudit, country where paragraph.versionId = #id# and paragraph.id = observation.paragraphId and observation.id = delegateaudit.objectId and delegateaudit.countryId = country.id AND (delegateaudit.actionId = 2 OR delegateaudit.actionId = 4) and observation.deleted = 0 group by observation.id, observation.creationDate, country.id, country.name order by observation.id
